item.title: ‘The Secret Lives of Mormon Wives’ Sets Season 3 Premiere Date for November
item.description: Roughly three months after season two arrived on Hulu, the demand for the women of #MomTok hasn’t slowed down, as two castmembers additionally gear up for joint ‘DWTS’ appearances.

item.title: MomTok on Top: ‘The Secret Lives of Mormon Wives’ Earns First Emmy Nomination
item.description: Hulu’s breakout series, centered around a group of Mormon mom influencers, was nominated in the outstanding unstructured reality program category on Tuesday.
